attributes.action: Make country good by making PM listen
attributes.additional_details:
What to do:
Abolish university fees
Raise the tax for the rich
Lower the tax for the poor
Tax on Queen's money
More money to education
More money to NHS
More money to prison system
More money to climate change prevention schemes
Take money out of coal and oil schemes
More money to foreign aid
More money to justice system - reform not deterrence 
Money to libraries and museums 
Make marijuana legal and tax it
Raise consumption and environmental 
Raise corporation tax
Lower inheritance tax
attributes.background: We think the country is doing bad and want it to not do bad. The PM can make the country better and not rubbish. We have ideas of what to do. Please help us youths of whom want a gooder countrie for us to live in

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Your petition asks for a wide range of different actions on a variety of subjects. You could start some new petitions asking for specific actions. You may also find that there are already some petitions open on the site that you would like to sign.
